channel.title: org to web
channel.description: Recent content on org to web

item.title: Tracking Digital Traces(self)
item.description:
Contribs

  • Issue: Memory check in % rather than fixed value issue#11

    Needed a feature, asked for it, nobody cared, so made it and shared it 😅

    It’s so funny to create a issue first and address your own issue with a PR 😌 afterwards.

  • Issue: EC2 inventory script (ec2.py) needs better error messages & guidance issue#10840

    Stucked with a problem, googled it, found the solution, felt bad nobody cared about it before. Asked if could write PR, rejected. Tried again but enhancing the docs, finally made it through.

    Moral of story, try try until you get it merged 😀

Swag

  • Merge conflict resolve in EMACS …surprisingly exicited to get my tweet🐦 featured in in Irreal’s blog: Merging with smerge
